survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Automated Car Wash Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of automated car wash services to understand their satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and explore opportunities for service improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use automated car wash services?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use automated car wash services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following automated car wash features are most important to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select options. Ensure the options are comprehensive yet concise.

script.question_text: Which of the following automated car wash features are most important to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the quality of cleaning provided by automated car wash services? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents except first-time users (if Q1 = 'First-time user', skip to Q5)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction rating. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the quality of cleaning provided by automated car wash services? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents except first-time users (if Q1 = 'First-time user', skip to Q5)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for automated car wash services?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who rated satisfaction 3 or below in Q3
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field for detailed feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly for longer responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for automated car wash services?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who rated satisfaction 3 or below in Q3

questions.question_text: Would you recommend automated car wash services to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Keep the options simple and clear.

script.question_text: Would you recommend automated car wash services to others?

questions.question_text: What factors would encourage you to use automated car wash services more frequently?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field for detailed feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly for longer responses.

script.question_text: What factors would encourage you to use automated car wash services more frequently?
